          subroutine heapify(arr, n, i)
          integer :: arr(n), n, i
          integer :: largest, l, r, temp

          largest = i
          l = 2*i
          r = 2*i+1

          if (l <= n) then
             if (arr(l) > arr(largest)) then
                 largest = l
             end if
          end if

          if (r <= n) then
             if (arr(r) > arr(largest)) then
                 largest = r
             end if
          end if

          if (largest /= i) then
             temp = arr(i)
             arr(i) = arr(largest)
             arr(largest) = temp
             call heapify(arr, n, largest)
          end if

          subroutine heapify(arr, n, i)
          integer :: arr(n), n, i
          integer :: largest, l, r, temp

          largest = i
          l = 2*i
          r = 2*i+1

          if (l <= n) then
             if (arr(l) > arr(largest)) then
                 largest = l
             end if
          end if

          if (r <= n) then
             if (arr(r) > arr(largest)) then
                 largest = r
             end if
          end if

          if (largest /= i) then
             temp = arr(i)
             arr(i) = arr(largest)
             arr(largest) = temp
             call heapify(arr, n, largest)
          end if
          end subroutine
